SEARCH
Package examblock.model

Class Desk

Object
Desk
public class Desk extends Object
Represents an individual desk in an exam venue.

  • Constructor Summary

    Description

    Constructs a Desk.

  • Constructor Details

    • Desk

      public Desk(int deskNumber)
      Constructs a Desk. Assigns the integer deskNumber as the numerical identifier and assigns empty Strings to the names.
      Parameters:
      deskNumber - the non-zero positive integer desk number.

  • Method Details

    • deskNumber

      public int deskNumber()
      Gets the number of this desk.
      Returns:
      The number of this desk.

    • deskStudent

      public String deskStudent()
      Return the student allocated to this desk
      Returns:
      the Student, or an empty string if not allocated

    • deskLui

      public long deskLui()
      Gets the LUI of the student assigned to this desk.
      Returns:
      The LUI of the student assigned to this desk.

    • deskFamilyName

      public String deskFamilyName()
      Gets the family name of the student assigned to this desk.
      Returns:
      The family name of the student assigned to this desk.

    • deskGivenAndInit

      public String deskGivenAndInit()
      Gets the first given name and initial of the student assigned to this desk. Gets the first given name, a space, the initial of first middle name, if any, with a full stop after the initial (if present) of the student assigned to this desk.
      Returns:
      The first given name and initial of the student assigned to this desk.

    • setStudent

      public void setStudent(Student student)
      Allocate a student to this desk
      Parameters:
      student - student to assign

    • setGivenAndInit

      public void setGivenAndInit(String givenAndInit)
      Manually change the allocated student's displayed name
      Parameters:
      givenAndInit - new name

    • setExam

      public void setExam(Exam exam)
      Allocate an exam for this desk
      Parameters:
      exam - exam to allocate

    • deskExam

      public String deskExam()
      Return the exam being taken at this desk
      Returns:
      the exam at this desk

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of this desk. (Returns the desk number and any assigned student.)
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      The string representation of this desk.

    • streamOut

    • streamIn

      public void streamIn(BufferedReader br, String examName) throws IOException
      Read itself from an input stream
      Parameters:
      br - stream to read from
      examName - Use this as the exam name value (saves duplicating it for each desk)
      Throws:
      IOException - on any IO related issues
